Package solver.reachablepoints

Interface IReachablePoints

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GraphCalculator, ReachablePointsMultithreaded, ReachablePointsSingleThreaded
    public interface IReachablePoints
    Interface for reachable points calculations. The instances are responsible for calculating the success and cut off ratings for the given information. Results should be stored until they are updated.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ActionsRating combineActionsRating​(double aggressiveWeight, double defensiveWeight)
      Combines the last calculated ActionsRating.
      Collection<utility.geometry.ContextualFloatMatrix> getContextualFloatMatrices​(utility.game.player.PlayerAction action)
      Creates for all last calculated Matrix-Results a ContextualFloatMatrix.
      void logGameInformation​(ActionsRating combinedActionsRating)
      Logs the last calculated Ratings and the combined rating as LoggingLevel.GAME_INFO.
      void performCalculation​(utility.game.step.GameStep gameStep, utility.geometry.FloatMatrix probabilities, utility.geometry.FloatMatrix minSteps)
      Performs the calculation with the given values and updates the stored results.

    • Method Detail

      • performCalculation

        void performCalculation​(utility.game.step.GameStep gameStep,
                        utility.geometry.FloatMatrix probabilities,
                        utility.geometry.FloatMatrix minSteps)
        Performs the calculation with the given values and updates the stored results.
        Parameters:
        gameStep - IPlayer of yourself in the spe_ed game
        probabilities - FloatMatrix containing the enemy probability values
        minSteps - FloatMatrix containing the minimum enemy steps for each element

      • combineActionsRating

        ActionsRating combineActionsRating​(double aggressiveWeight,
                                   double defensiveWeight)
        Combines the last calculated ActionsRating.
        Parameters:
        aggressiveWeight - weight for the ActionsRating, which stimulates aggresive decisions
        defensiveWeight - weight for the ActionsRating, which stimulates defensive decisions
        Returns:
        the combined ratings

      • logGameInformation

        void logGameInformation​(ActionsRating combinedActionsRating)
        Logs the last calculated Ratings and the combined rating as LoggingLevel.GAME_INFO.
        Parameters:
        combinedActionsRating - the combined Rating to log

      • getContextualFloatMatrices

        Collection<utility.geometry.ContextualFloatMatrix> getContextualFloatMatrices​(utility.game.player.PlayerAction action)
        Creates for all last calculated Matrix-Results a ContextualFloatMatrix.
        Parameters:
        action - for matrix results grouped by Collection the matrix for the given action will be used
        Returns:
        a Collection of ContextualFloatMatrices
